A hill top abode near Gurgaon, Bhondsi is tucked away in a green forest belt with a beautiful temple atop the hill. Very nice cycling track away from traffic and very quick get away from city. There is a lake near the Goddess Bhuvneshwari temple where you can relax and enjoy the untouched beauty of nature with white swans. It is located approximately 8 KM from Rajiv Chowk on NH8. Take a left turn from Rajiv Chowk and keep going straight until you hit Badshapur village. After crossing Badshapur cross 1 more KM and take a right turn rowards Bhondsi Green belt area. This road will take you directly to temple after some curves in Green belt which you would enjoy. Badshapur is approx 7 KM from Rajiv Chowk and to reach here you have to take a left turn from Rajiv Chowk and after crossing Badhshapur.
This is a very good cycling track you can cover.
